enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.arc: Protects from magical and blast damage sources
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.ele: Protects from fire, freeze and natural damage sources
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.phy: Protects from projectile and melee direct damage sources
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.smi: Lights struck targets on fire and deals increased damage to fire-susceptible foes, such as the undead
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.chi: Has a chance to freeze struck targets and deals increased damage to freeze-susceptible foes, such as arthropods
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.fra: The cursed item has a chance to take increased durability damage when used
text.autoconfig.enchants_and_expeditions: Whether the rebalanced experience-per-level formula should be used, which includes more reasonable experience requirements beyond level 30
Whether books should be enchantable at the enchanting table
The formula to be used for calculating the probability of chiseled bookshelf enchanting. Either LINEAR, EXPONENTIAL or QUADRATIC
The added chance of getting the chiseled bookshelf book enchantment at the first copy of a book
The added chance of getting the chiseled bookshelf book enchantment at the tenth copy of a book
The amount of books which must be placed in a chiseled bookshelf to count towards boosting the enchanting table power
The chance of an enchantment from a chiseled bookshelf replacing one from the table, rather than adding to the output enchantments
Whether loot tables which do not specify an enchantment pool should default to #on_random_loot. It is recommended to keep this enabled
Whether Enchants and Expeditions should append loot tables with additional enchanted books
